content: let s travel back to prehistoric times here s my free baby dinosaur amigurumi pattern crochet them while they re still young and adorable before they turn out to be mighty ferocious and takes a big bite out of you this baby dinosaur features a wide mouth for its teeth to grow in as well as stubby little arms to wave around this is part of my open mouth amigurumi 1 series i ll keep continuing to add more patterns as i go you can learn how to use the open mouth technique by following this tutorial here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/open-mouth-amigurumi-base and with your base head you can create all sorts of different creatures be sure to tag me with your projects on instagram 2 or facebook 3 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 5in/13cm tall **level ** easy **need to know ** crochet in the round single_crochet how to increase and decrease 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/open-mouth-amigurumi-series 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
